subject: So is this a black box recording?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I can only use a metal cabinet with car tuners, I made this over a year
ago, and made the board back in October. The bottom is about 18 gauge
galvanized steel, the top is recycled VCR cabinet. Classic Frankenized.
